title: When a fire comes to you
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner

abstract: 'I think my dad is like my great grandpa, he's very helpful...'
description: When the threat of fire hit Lydia Romari's family, they adopted their fire plan and stayed safe. Unfortunately, it doesn't erase the frustration, anxiety and horror of the Black Saturday bushfires that devestated much of the Yarra Ranges region in Victoria in 2009.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001447; Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters; Active; 2009
